info.name: Tabs in Titlebar in restored window
info.description:
Show tabs in the title bar even in restored windows.

You may need to restore or maximize the window once to apply the style properly.
The margins are set based on the Windows 7 Aero theme and may need to be changed.

Get more useful tweaks from user 43231
info.additionalInfo:
2011/11/14 - Menu-bar shouldn't be hidden when enabled. Increased top margin to allow moving the window.
2012/03/16 - Fixed an error with tabs on bottom; allow retaining Firefox button; some code cleanup
